mapper.select: select a.*,b.program_money,b.is_program from company_material_in a LEFT JOIN cg_contract b on a.cg_no=b.cg_no AND b.history=1
mapper.update: update company_material_in set cg_no=#{cm.cgNo}, cg_name=#{cm.cgName}, task_no=#{cm.taskNo}, sent_date=#{cm.sentDate}, collect_person=#{cm.collectPerson}, demand_project=#{cm.demandProject}, cm_desc=#{cm.cmDesc}, acceptance_opinion=#{cm.acceptanceOpinion}, freight=#{cm.freight} where cm_id=#{cm.cmId}
update company_material_in set out_state=#{outstate} where cm_id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from company_material_in where task_no like #{no} and out_state=#{outstate} or out_state=3
mapper.update: update company_material_in set get_person=#{gsIn.getPerson}, get_department=#{gsIn.getDepartment}, get_infos=#{gsIn.getInfos}, get_status=#{gsIn.getStatus} where cm_id=#{gsIn.cmId}
mapper.select: select DISTINCT task_no,demand_project,cg_no,cg_name,cm_id from company_material_in where get_status=1 GROUP BY task_no
select * from company_material_in a left JOIN company_material_in_cl b on a.cm_id=b.gs_in_id where task_no like #{no} and get_status=1 and remain_type=#{type} and b.cl_remain!=0 GROUP BY cm_id
select * from company_material_in where task_no like #{no} and out_state=1 and get_status=1 and remain_type!=0
select * from company_material_in where task_no like #{no} and remain_type!=0
mapper.update: update company_material_in set remain_type=#{type} where cm_id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from company_material_in a LEFT JOIN cl_remain b on a.cm_id=b.gs_out_id where a.remain_type=2 and b.remain_number!=0 GROUP BY cm_id
select * from company_material_in where out_state=#{outstate} and get_status=#{getstate} or out_state=3 and get_status=#{getstate}
